product_name: ALPS Mountaineering 4-Person Floor Saver Tent Footprint - Special Buy
long_description: The 4-person Floor Saver tent footprint fits ALPS Mountaineering 4-person tents and rectangular-floored tents in the 102 x 90 in. range. Footprint is sized to help prevent pooling of water under tent during rainy weather. Comes in a stuff sack with drawcord and toggle closure. Special buy.
short_description: The 4-person Floor Saver tent footprint fits ALPS Mountaineering 4-person tents and rectangular-floored tents in the 102 x 90 in. range.
